trans-unit.source: Supported configurations for Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Supported configurations for Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Learn about the configurations needed for Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Learn about the configurations needed for Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Supported configurations for Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Supported configurations for Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: What do you need to use Operational Insights?
trans-unit.target: What do you need to use Operational Insights?

trans-unit.source: Check out the following information to prepare for Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Check out the following information to prepare for Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: Configuration for System Center 2012 Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: Configuration for System Center 2012 Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: You can use Operational Insights as an attached service in Operations Manager in System Center 2012 R2 or System Center 2012 SP1 R2.
trans-unit.target: You can use Operational Insights as an attached service in Operations Manager in System Center 2012 R2 or System Center 2012 SP1 R2.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use the Operations console in Operations Manager to view Operational Insights alerts and configuration information.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to use the Operations console in Operations Manager to view Operational Insights alerts and configuration information.

trans-unit.source: When you use Operational Insights as an attached service in Operations Manager, the agent communicates directly with the management server, which in turn communicates with the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: When you use Operational Insights as an attached service in Operations Manager, the agent communicates directly with the management server, which in turn communicates with the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: Using Operational Insights as an attached service has the following prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Using Operational Insights as an attached service has the following prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: Integration between System Center 2012 SP1 Operations Manager and Operational Insights requires updated management packs that are included in the [Operational Insights Connector for Operations Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=38199).
trans-unit.target: Integration between System Center 2012 SP1 Operations Manager and Operational Insights requires updated management packs that are included in the [Operational Insights Connector for Operations Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=38199).

trans-unit.source: You can download and install the management packs from [Operational Insights Connector for Operations Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=38199).
trans-unit.target: You can download and install the management packs from [Operational Insights Connector for Operations Manager](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=38199).

trans-unit.source: System Center 2012 SP1: Operations Manager Update Rollup 6, although Update Rollup 7 is preferred.
trans-unit.target: System Center 2012 SP1: Operations Manager Update Rollup 6, although Update Rollup 7 is preferred.

trans-unit.source: This update needs to be applied to the management server, agents, and Operations console for the Operational Insights as an attached service scenario.
trans-unit.target: This update needs to be applied to the management server, agents, and Operations console for the Operational Insights as an attached service scenario.

trans-unit.source: System Center 2012 R2: Operations Manager Update Rollup 2, although Update Rollup 3 is preferred.
trans-unit.target: System Center 2012 R2: Operations Manager Update Rollup 2, although Update Rollup 3 is preferred.

trans-unit.source: This update needs to be applied to the management server, agents, and Operations console for the Operational Insights as an attached service scenario.
trans-unit.target: This update needs to be applied to the management server, agents, and Operations console for the Operational Insights as an attached service scenario.

trans-unit.source: To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).
trans-unit.target: To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).

trans-unit.source: For additional information about connecting the systems, see [How to connect VMM with Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh882396.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For additional information about connecting the systems, see [How to connect VMM with Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh882396.aspx).

trans-unit.source: See [Viewing Operational Insights Alerts](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293793) for installation and configuration instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Viewing Operational Insights Alerts](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293793) for installation and configuration instructions.

trans-unit.source: If you want to view Operational Insights alerts about SharePoint Server 2010, Lync Server 2013, Lync Server 2010, or System Center 2012 SP1 - Virtual Machine Manager, you need to configure a Run As account for those workloads.
trans-unit.target: If you want to view Operational Insights alerts about SharePoint Server 2010, Lync Server 2013, Lync Server 2010, or System Center 2012 SP1 - Virtual Machine Manager, you need to configure a Run As account for those workloads.

trans-unit.source: See [Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights](operational-insights-operations-manager.md) for information about how to set Run As accounts.
trans-unit.target: See [Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights](operational-insights-operations-manager.md) for information about how to set Run As accounts.

trans-unit.source: Operations Manager operating systems
trans-unit.target: Operations Manager operating systems

trans-unit.source: Operations Manager agents are supported on a variety of computers.
trans-unit.target: Operations Manager agents are supported on a variety of computers.

trans-unit.source: See [System Requirements: System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn249696.aspx) for details about agent support.
trans-unit.target: See [System Requirements: System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn249696.aspx) for details about agent support.

trans-unit.source: Required software for Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: Required software for Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with VMM.
trans-unit.target: To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with VMM.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about connecting the systems, see [How to connect VMM with Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh882396.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For additional information about connecting the systems, see [How to connect VMM with Operations Manager](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh882396.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Agents connecting directly to Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Agents connecting directly to Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: The agent used to connect directly to the service is the Microsoft Monitoring agent.
trans-unit.target: The agent used to connect directly to the service is the Microsoft Monitoring agent.

trans-unit.source: Its system requirements are listed on the [Microsoft Download Center](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40316&e6b34bbe-475b-1abd-2c51-b5034bcdd6d2=True) page.
trans-unit.target: Its system requirements are listed on the [Microsoft Download Center](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40316&e6b34bbe-475b-1abd-2c51-b5034bcdd6d2=True) page.

trans-unit.source: Browsers
trans-unit.target: Browsers

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the following browsers with Operational Insights:
trans-unit.target: You can use any of the following browsers with Operational Insights:

trans-unit.source: Windows Internet Explorer 11, Internet Explorer 10, Internet Explorer 9, Internet Explorer 8, or Internet Explorer 7
trans-unit.target: Windows Internet Explorer 11, Internet Explorer 10, Internet Explorer 9, Internet Explorer 8, or Internet Explorer 7

trans-unit.source: Mozilla Firefox 3.5 or later
trans-unit.target: Mozilla Firefox 3.5 or later

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the browser you use, you must also install Microsoft Silverlight 4.
trans-unit.target: Regardless of the browser you use, you must also install Microsoft Silverlight 4.

trans-unit.source: Technologies you can analyze
trans-unit.target: Technologies you can analyze

trans-unit.source: Operational Insights Configuration Assessment analyzes the following workloads:
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights Configuration Assessment analyzes the following workloads:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 and Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 and Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008 R2, including:
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008 R2, including:

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V host
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V host

trans-unit.source: General operating system
trans-unit.target: General operating system

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2008 R2, SQL Server 2008
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2008 R2, SQL Server 2008

trans-unit.source: SQL Server Database Engine
trans-unit.target: SQL Server Database Engine

trans-unit.source: Microsoft SharePoint 2010
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SharePoint 2010

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Exchange Server 2010 and Microsoft Exchange Server 2013
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Exchange Server 2010 and Microsoft Exchange Server 2013

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Lync Server 2013 and Lync Server 2010
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Lync Server 2013 and Lync Server 2010

trans-unit.source: System Center 2012 SP1 – Virtual Machine Manager
trans-unit.target: System Center 2012 SP1 – Virtual Machine Manager

trans-unit.source: For SQL Server, the following 32-bit and 64-bit editions are supported for analysis:
trans-unit.target: For SQL Server, the following 32-bit and 64-bit editions are supported for analysis:

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Enterprise
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Enterprise

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Standard
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Standard

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Workgroup
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Workgroup

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Web
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Web

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Express
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 Express

trans-unit.source: In addition, the 32-bit edition of SQL Server is supported when running in the WOW64 implementation.
trans-unit.target: In addition, the 32-bit edition of SQL Server is supported when running in the WOW64 implementation.
